DOC.detailed_description: Thirty patient select meeting follow criterion : Inclusion Criteria : A . At least one Miller Class I II mucogingival defect ≥ 3 mm ( Miller 1985 ) . B . The mucogingival defect must non-molar tooth . C. Patients must ≥ 18 year age . Exclusion Criteria : A . Patients debilitate systemic disease significantly affect periodontium . B . Patients know allergy material use study , include systemic antibiotic ( tetracycline doxycycline ) . C. Patients require antibiotic prophylaxis . D. Root surface restoration site recession . E. No detectable cemento-enamel junction . F. Patients fail maintain oral hygiene level least 80 % plaque free surface . G. Patients pregnant lactating . H. Patients use tobacco product ( smoke smokeless tobacco ) . I . Patients alcohol abuse problem . J . Patients undergo long-term steroid therapy . K. History previous root coverage procedure , graft guide tissue regeneration , test teeth . L. Patients fail complete informed consent form .
